trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around March 1st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile walking home from a restaurant in downtown Phoenix with a friend I looked at the moon and then saw a bright green, large sphere-like object drop from the sky at a slight angle -at a very quick speed - then vanish over the top of the phoenix skyline in an instant. It did not fade out but quickly disappeared. I noted there were no fireworks going off and nothing else out of the ordinary. My friend thought I was crazy until we found out other individuals had seen the same thing. Checked out Heavens above and did not see any listings for satellite visibility at the time. Unfortunately it was too quick for me to snap a photo with my phone.
Summary: Round bright green light drops from sky then vanishes
